Levels.new_bloc_shape: a block in which three shapes are presented
Levels.new_bloc_face: a block in which three faces are presented

nbloc.Description: Progressive number of the block performed

onset.Description: Onset of the stimulus in seconds

duration.Description: Duration of the stimulus in seconds

ntrial.Description: Progressive number of the trial within a given block

stim_file_top.Description: Path and name of the image file presented at the top

stim_file_left.Description: Path and name of the image file presented on the left

stim_file_right.Description: Path and name of the image file presented on the right

correct_answer.Description: Answer that should have been provided

response_time.Description: Time taken to provide the answer

countdown_stim.Description: If used, decreasing number shown on the screen during the get-ready phase of the task
